Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Connects the model to the users input in View.

    • Method Detail

      • sale

        public void sale(java.lang.String salesmanName,
                 java.lang.String productName,
                 int amount)
          throws WrongSalesmanNameException,
                 WrongProductInputException,
                 SellingBelowOneException
        Starts the sale using input from the user.
        Parameters:
        salesmanName - name of the salesman that sold a product.
        productName - name of the sold product.
        amount - amount sold.
        Throws:
        WrongSalesmanNameException - thrown if the salesman doesn't exist.
        WrongProductInputException - thrown if the product doesn't exist or there's not enough of it.
        SellingBelowOneException - thrown when less than one piece of product is attempted to be sold.
